top_categories.workout_context: Grinduro Germany's Eifel volcanic landscape, German forest gravel roads forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 62 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Grinduro Germany's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before May.
106ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At Grinduro Germany, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Grinduro Germany, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
6,562ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Grinduro Germany. Train it until it feels boring.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on enduro-style gravel with timed descents. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
62 miles on enduro-style gravel with timed descents burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
6,562ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
Smooth pedaling at 62 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.
Low-cadence force work for 6,562ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Grinduro Germany’s 62 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Highly technical terrain at Grinduro Germany demands practice on similar surfaces. Ride enduro-style gravel with timed descents at race-day cadence weekly. Expect: eifel volcanic landscape, german forest gravel roads, technical singletrack descents. Practice cornering, descending, and power delivery on unstable surfaces. Dial in tire pressure before race week — 5 PSI wrong costs you 15+ minutes over 62 miles.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 62 miles of enduro-style gravel with timed descents in Hellenthal, Eifel, Germany.
